verses.verse: All <S%H3605><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%> shall ye observe <S%H8104><s%> to do, <S%H6213><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> ye may live, <S%H2421><s%> and multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and go in <S%H935><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers. <S%H1><s%>

And thou shalt remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> led <S%H1980><s%> thee these <S%H2088><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> to <S%H4616><s%> humble <S%H6031><s%> thee, and to prove <S%H5254><s%> thee, to know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> what <S%H834><s%> was in thine heart, <S%H3824><s%> whether thou wouldest keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments, <S%H4687><s%> or <S%H518><s%> not. <S%H3808><s%>

And he humbled <S%H6031><s%> thee, and suffered thee to hunger, <S%H7456><s%> and fed <S%H398><s%> thee with <S%H854><s%> manna, <S%H4478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou knewest <S%H3045><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> did thy fathers <S%H1><s%> know; <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> he might make thee know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> man <S%H120><s%> doth not <S%H3808><s%> live <S%H2421><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> only, <S%H905><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> word that proceedeth out <S%H4161><s%> of the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> doth man <S%H120><s%> live. <S%H2421><s%>

Thy raiment <S%H8071><s%> waxed not old <S%H1086><s%> <S%H3808><s%> upon <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee, neither <S%H3808><s%> did thy foot <S%H7272><s%> swell, <S%H1216><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

Thou shalt also consider <S%H3045><s%> in <S%H5973><s%> thine heart, <S%H3824><s%> that, <S%H3588><s%> as <S%H834><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> chasteneth <S%H3256><s%> <S%H853><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> so the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> chasteneth <S%H3256><s%> thee.

Therefore thou shalt keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> to walk <S%H1980><s%> in his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and to fear <S%H3372><s%> him.

For <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> bringeth <S%H935><s%> thee into <S%H413><s%> a good <S%H2896><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> of brooks <S%H5158><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> of fountains <S%H5869><s%> and depths <S%H8415><s%> that spring out <S%H3318><s%> of valleys <S%H1237><s%> and hills; <S%H2022><s%>

A land <S%H776><s%> of wheat, <S%H2406><s%> and barley, <S%H8184><s%> and vines, <S%H1612><s%> and fig trees, <S%H8384><s%> and pomegranates; <S%H7416><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> olive, <S%H2132><s%> and honey; <S%H1706><s%>

A land <S%H776><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> scarceness, <S%H4544><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> lack <S%H2637><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> thing in it; a land <S%H776><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> are iron, <S%H1270><s%> and out of whose hills <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2042><s%> thou mayest dig <S%H2672><s%> brass. <S%H5178><s%>

When thou hast eaten <S%H398><s%> and art full, <S%H7646><s%> then thou shalt bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he hath given <S%H5414><s%> thee.

Beware <S%H8104><s%> that thou forget not <S%H6435><s%> <S%H7911><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> in not <S%H1115><s%> keeping <S%H8104><s%> his commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and his judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and his statutes, <S%H2708><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee this day: <S%H3117><s%>
Lest <S%H6435><s%> when thou hast eaten <S%H398><s%> and art full, <S%H7646><s%> and hast built <S%H1129><s%> goodly <S%H2896><s%> houses, <S%H1004><s%> and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> therein;

And when thy herds <S%H1241><s%> and thy flocks <S%H6629><s%> multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and thy silver <S%H3701><s%> and thy gold <S%H2091><s%> is multiplied, <S%H7235><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou hast is multiplied; <S%H7235><s%>

Then thine heart <S%H3824><s%> be lifted up, <S%H7311><s%> and thou forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> which brought thee forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of bondage; <S%H5650><s%>

Who led <S%H1980><s%> thee through that great <S%H1419><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%> wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> wherein were fiery <S%H8314><s%> serpents, <S%H5175><s%> and scorpions, <S%H6137><s%> and drought, <S%H6774><s%> where <S%H834><s%> there was no <S%H369><s%> water; <S%H4325><s%> who brought thee forth <S%H3318><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> out of the rock <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6697><s%> of flint; <S%H2496><s%>

Who fed <S%H398><s%> thee in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> with manna, <S%H4478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thy fathers <S%H1><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> he might humble <S%H6031><s%> thee, and that <S%H4616><s%> he might prove <S%H5254><s%> thee, to do thee good <S%H3190><s%> at thy latter end; <S%H319><s%>

And thou say <S%H559><s%> in thine heart, <S%H3824><s%> My power <S%H3581><s%> and the might <S%H6108><s%> of mine hand <S%H3027><s%> hath gotten <S%H6213><s%> me <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> wealth. <S%H2428><s%>

But thou shalt remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God: <S%H430><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it is he <S%H1931><s%> that giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee power <S%H3581><s%> to get <S%H6213><s%> wealth, <S%H2428><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> he may establish <S%H6965><s%> <S%H853><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he swore <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers, <S%H1><s%> as it is this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> if <S%H518><s%> thou do at all forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H7911><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> and walk <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> them, and worship <S%H7812><s%> them, I testify <S%H5749><s%> against you this day <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> ye shall surely perish. <S%H6><s%> <S%H6><s%>

As the nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> destroyeth <S%H6><s%> before your face, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> shall ye perish; <S%H6><s%> because <S%H6118><s%> ye would not <S%H3808><s%> be obedient <S%H8085><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
